desc: SELLING SUSTAINABLE HOME GOODS, NATURAL ORGANIC MATERIALS, AND ONE OF A KIND DECORATIVE ANTIQUES. INTERIOR DESIGNER SHOP PROVIDING ECO-FRIENDLY , EARTH FRIENDLY, LINEN, RECYCLED, RECLAIMED, REPURPOSED, AND VINTAGE ITEMS. WE ARE GREEN AND USE NON TOXIC MATERIALS.

layout.text: We are inspired by natural, eco-friendly, and locally sourced products.
